creditline: Lent by The family of Jessie Taber Duthie and Clifford Choisser Foster
description: miniature cradleboard with doll tied in place; fringe at top and bottom edges; mauve beaded back board, at head, with amorphous designs of green and white bands and blue, green and orange; tie downs beaded in green, blue, red, and yellow stripes, as well as above fringe at bottom
title: Miniature Cradleboard
